Reviews.Title: “Disappointing - but great location and staff.”
Reviews.Author: LJ_85
Reviews.Content: stayed december 2010 night 9 hotel easy location kings crossst pancras stations five minute walk lugging suitcase cheap hotel sleep london night busy sightseeing hotel hours sleep honest pleased freezing probably due snowing minus 5 outside singleglazed windows blowing draft heating eventually warmed thick blanket top bed stain actual duvet cover pillowcases sheet clean door inch gap bottom light shone hallway hear walking looked website wasnt nights sleep ive staff hotel friendly helpful check 11am looked suitcase attended job interview hairdryer request reception code wifi breakfast basement entered staff assorted cereals milk fruit tables else staff kitchen safe coffee toast fine personally wouldnt stay night sleep hours location price ok

Reviews.Title: “A good experience :)”
Reviews.Author: Dan_HB
Reviews.Content: stayed 11 nights real travel abroad vacation 1986 staff friendly helpful cozy sink fridge desk cupboard bed course sleep breakfast paid annoying noises bit outside expect city london hotel worn edges broken shower head tiles bathroom quickly fixed breakfast tasted ok complain wifi network didnt properly solved sitting stairs dining basement netbook oh live didnt travel london sit time pc location perfect short walk kings cross tube station bit walk reached central london foot lot london pleasant experince fits trip london hotel greetings denmark

Reviews.Title: “So dirty I'm surprised I didn't catch anything”
Reviews.Author: TripReviewer03
Reviews.Content: location fantastic 510 minute walk main train station thatâ€™s arrived easter holiday time business trip paid abit especially getting booked requested ensuite wasnt manager refused refund difference worse stank carpets dirtyand bed broken literally soon sat bed sunk middle unsafe night uncomfortable night broken bed cant remember breakfast getting aching thankfully staying night term damage avoid creepy seedy little looks lovely outside stinky inside donâ€™t bring kids theyll forgive

Reviews.Title: “Very good B&B budget hotel.”
Reviews.Author: brekibrek
Reviews.Content: lisa court bb close kings cross st station arriving london train definately recommend nice friendly staff clean breakfast included price english breakfast hotel located street bb hotels camden trendy safe

Reviews.Title: “Don't do it!”
Reviews.Author: NeilKP
Reviews.Content: following mix hotels refused admit shunted ensuite uneven floor window didnt lock shut shower shared dribble sink toilet partially hanging wall broken floor tiles morning toilet roll staff found hotel clean else positive considering street square crammed hotels plenty hotels nicer recommend avoiding hotel cost

Reviews.Title: “not really worth the money”
Reviews.Author: berry87
Reviews.Content: stayed single 1 night job interview acceptable thats expected clean didnt bathroom reading reviews maybe lucky shower evening else bathroom tea coffee facilities means 1 tea bag 1 coffee sachet bit stingy maybe im fussy didnt try couldnt breakfast started late 8am cant comment woman bit abrupt booked night surprised bit suspicious spending ages checking photocopying id booking surprised internet wasnt supposed didnt particularly feel welcome ok checked crack dawn 24 hour reception basically means slept reception bed didnt nights sleep ring bell hotel door locked people kept ringing bell night traipsing bit noise road outside ok didnt particularly feel worth â£45 nice hotel own bathroom

Reviews.Title: “Kings Cross area is only for the person arriving at St Pancras to stay for 1 to 2 days TOPS.”
Reviews.Author: ralarco
Reviews.Content: expected charming outside inside elevators heavy luggage slim stairs safe leave luggage checked hotels alternative leaving st pancras cross st luggage storage share bathroom shower share usually 2 floors 6 breakfast basic pay worst television reception awful idea tvs stayed 2 signal access hotel ring bell main door wait door manually hotels adjacent streets checkin price highly recommend location example bayswater hostel private cleaner safer location cheaper price single staying days stay kings cross hotels kings cross person arriving st pancras stay 1 2 days tops
